docs.snippet: Leaders from Franklin D. Roosevelt forward knew that friendly relationships with Latin America encouraged the assimilation and loyalty of Hispanics in the United States....
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Geraldo L Cadava warns White House's goal of comprehensive immigration reform will be hard to achieve unless United States re-envisions its approach to Latin American countries; notes leaders historically knew that friendly relationships with Latin America encouraged assimilation and loyalty of Hispanics in the United States.
docs.lead_paragraph: Leaders from Franklin D. Roosevelt forward knew that friendly relationships with Latin America encouraged the assimilation and loyalty of Hispanics in the United States.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Official Threatens Suit In British Pedophile Case
headline.seo: Ex-Official Threatens Suit in Pedophile Scandal
headline.main: Ex-Official Threatens Suit in British Pedophile Case

docs.snippet: A former Conservative Party official says his name was falsely made public in an inquiry into child sexual abuse involving Jimmy Savile, the host of BBC programs from the 1970s to the 1990s....
docs.abstract: Alistair McAlpine, former official of Britain's Conservative Party, says his name was falsely made public in an inquiry into child sexual abuse involving former BBC host Jimmy Savile; McAlpine pledges to take legal action to clear his name.
docs.lead_paragraph: A former Conservative Party official says his name was falsely made public in an inquiry into child sexual abuse involving Jimmy Savile, the host of BBC programs from the 1970s to the 1990s.

headline.print_headline: Pitino and Son Are on Same Path and Same Page
headline.seo: Rick Pitino Says Florida International Is Good Fit for Son Richard’s Coaching Debut
headline.main: Pitino and Son Are on Same Path and Same Page

docs.snippet: Rick Pitino, who has led six teams to the Final Four, including last season at Louisville, at first had reservations about his son Richard taking the head coaching job at Florida International....
docs.abstract: Richard Pitino, at 30 years old, will become one of youngest coaches in Division 1 college basketball when he starts his job at Florida International this season; his father, Louisville coach Rick Pitino, had initially expressed doubts about his son's choice of profession, but now supports him fully.
docs.lead_paragraph: Rick Pitino, who has led six teams to the Final Four, including last season at Louisville, at first had reservations about his son Richard taking the head coaching job at Florida International.

headline.print_headline: Cuba’s Prospects for an Oil-Fueled Economic Jolt Falter With Departure of Rig
headline.seo: Rig’s Departure to Hamper Cuba’s Oil Prospects
headline.main: Cuba’s Prospects for an Oil-Fueled Economic Jolt Falter With Departure of Rig

docs.snippet: The one deepwater rig able to work in Cuban waters is to be removed within weeks, a blow to a nation that had hoped a windfall would save its economy....
docs.abstract: Cuba’s hopes of reviving its economy with an oil boom have produced little more than three dry holes, persuading foreign oil companies to remove the one deepwater rig able to work in Cuban waters so it could be used for more lucrative prospects elsewhere.

byline.original: By CLIFFORD KRAUSS and DAMIEN CAVE
byline.contributor: Clifford Krauss reported from Houston, and Damien Cave from Mexico City.

docs.lead_paragraph: The one deepwater rig able to work in Cuban waters is to be removed within weeks, a blow to a nation that had hoped a windfall would save its economy.

headline.print_headline: Deep in a Flooded Tunnel, Mud and a Little Bit of Light
headline.seo: At Bottom of Brooklyn Tunnel, Seeing Some Light
headline.main: Deep in a Flooded Tunnel, Mud and a Little Bit of Light

docs.snippet: In the flooded Brooklyn-Battery Tunnel, engineers are using shafts that were designed to pump air in to pump out water that flooded during Hurricane Sandy....
docs.abstract: Efforts to reopen the Brooklyn-Battery Tunnel continue; engineers are using existing air shafts to pump out water and allow for an inspection of the two-mile long structure; earth-moving machinery will then enter the tunnel for removal of mud and debris.
docs.lead_paragraph: In the flooded Brooklyn-Battery Tunnel, engineers are using shafts that were designed to pump air in to pump out water that flooded during Hurricane Sandy.

headline.print_headline: Hurricane Exposed Flaws In Protection Of Tunnels
headline.seo: Storm Showed Vulnerability of City’s Tunnels
headline.main: Hurricane Exposed Flaws in Protection of Tunnels

docs.snippet: The flooding of major tunnels during Hurricane Sandy underscores the need for significant modifications to prevent such failures from occurring again....
docs.abstract: Vital arteries that bring cars, trucks and subways into New York City’s transportation network have recovered from Hurricane Sandy, with the exception of the Brooklyn-Battery Tunnel, which remains closed; devastation there underscores the reality that tunnels across the region will need significant modifications to prevent catastrophic failures in future weather events that could bring flooding of the magnitude seen with Sandy.
docs.lead_paragraph: The flooding of major tunnels during Hurricane Sandy underscores the need for significant modifications to prevent such failures from occurring again.

headline.print_headline: Chasing a Post-Storm Boogeyman Through Neighborhoods Gone Dark
headline.seo: Chasing a Post-Storm Boogeyman Through Neighborhoods Gone Dark
headline.main: Chasing a Post-Storm Bogeyman Through Neighborhoods Gone Dark

docs.snippet: In the days after Hurricane Sandy, as large parts of New York City had gone dark from blackouts, the hunt was on for looters, and the police were not the only ones on the lookout....
docs.abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column notes that in days following Hurricane Sandy, with large swaths of city dark from blackouts, New Yorkers posted plenty of warnings on their homes and businesses warning looters they would face dire consequences if caught.
docs.lead_paragraph: In the days after Hurricane Sandy, as large parts of New York City had gone dark from blackouts, the hunt was on for looters, and the police were not the only ones on the lookout.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Extends A Deadline For States On Coverage
headline.seo: U.S. Extends Deadline on Health Coverage for States
headline.main: U.S. Extends a Deadline for States on Coverage

docs.snippet: The Obama administration announced Friday that it would extend the deadline for states to submit their plans for health insurance exchanges....

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

docs.abstract: Obama administration, with many states lagging far behind schedule, says it will extend deadline for them to submit plans for health insurance exchanges, online markets where millions of Americans are expected to obtain private coverage subsidized by federal government.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Obama administration announced Friday that it would extend the deadline for states to submit their plans for health insurance exchanges.

headline.print_headline: Syracuse Sex Abuse Case Is Dropped
headline.seo: Sexual Abuse Case Against Ex-Syracuse Coach Bernie Fine Is Dropped
headline.main: Syracuse Sexual Abuse Case Is Dropped

docs.snippet: The authorities cited insufficient evidence supporting one of the sexual abuse claims that cost Bernie Fine, an assistant basketball coach at Syracuse, his job....
docs.abstract: Federal authorities drop their investigation into sexual abuse claims that cost Syracuse assistant basketball coach Bernie Fine his job, after finding no evidence to support claims that Fine molested a boy in 2002.
docs.lead_paragraph: The authorities cited insufficient evidence supporting one of the sexual abuse claims that cost Bernie Fine, an assistant basketball coach at Syracuse, his job.

headline.print_headline: Make Room For Deals After Turkey This Year
headline.seo: Black Friday Deals Will Start Earlier This Year
headline.main: Make Room for Deals After Turkey This Year

docs.snippet: Despite facing criticism for starting Black Friday sales at midnight last year, some retailers are planning to open on the evening of Thanksgiving Day....
docs.abstract: Some retailers are planning to open for shoppers in the early evening hours of Thanksgiving Day, despite facing criticism for the early start to Black Friday; workers and shoppers say holiday should be reserved for family, not lining up for the start of the Christmas shopping season.
docs.lead_paragraph: Despite facing criticism for starting Black Friday sales at midnight last year, some retailers are planning to open on the evening of Thanksgiving Day.
